sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>Characters with the Strong Arm talent treat thrown weapons as if they had one step greater range, to a maximum of medium range.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Strong Arm</name> <number>TAL0001228</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 13:07:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>af365ca62fbf1490e0f497eef699b6b8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 13:07:43</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
